Title: Ernest & Celestine
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Family, Fantasy
Director: Stéphane Aubier, Vincent Patar, Benjamin Renner
Writer: Daniel Pennac (scenario and dialogue), Gabrielle Vincent (after: D'après les albums de)
Actors: Forest Whitaker, Lambert Wilson, Pauline Brunner, Mackenzie Foy
Plot: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 15 nominations.
